channel.title: Evol, the love of money is the root of all evil
channel.description:
Evol is a server that is focused on working your own stuff, or maybe stealing it from someone.
The gold piece is supposed to have a real value hence you wont have 1m if you know what i'm talking about, It will be obtained from 4 main ways: -Stealing. -Selling your work(Food, clothes, stuff). -Trading with other players -Completing quests. 1.Stealing In this server you have the ability to take something you don't own or something you didn't work for But don't close your mind to stalls and npcs, open it up, and think about all the crates that are not used all around the world. Yes! You will be able to sack crates, caskets and more other things but if they catch you they will stab you. You will get a random punishment: 1.Pay a great amount of what you have. 2.Work in Jail to get out. 2.Selling your own work. That means that in this server you can work out your own stuff, and not buy it off shops because the gp is really priced and stores wont have cheap values. You will be able to pick food from plantations, or fish it, also a new kind of skill is introduced, called cattle. Some of the Cattle Like Cow or Sheep will be young or wooless, You will have to feed the Cattle, for example the Sheep uses/requires Goutweed to grow his wool. Once the Cattle is a grown Cattle you'll get a reward or if it already had a reward you'll get a better reward (Example: more meat pieces) 3.Trading with other players like you all know. 4.In this server there will be types of quests that you can only complete depending on your religion status You can whether be Saradoming, Zamorak or Guthix and depending on your religion is the quests that you can complete. Obviously there will be some quests that are for everybody. By completing these quests you will be rewarded experience and some gold pieces as a way to thank you. .. Wait how do i pick my religion? Well you don't "pick" it it will be defined by your actions, if you take of what's not yours, you'll side with evil, if you do nothing You'd be neutral and if you help people you'd be Good.
Transport: -Canoes -Feet -Teleport(Requires runes, and runes are obtained from rune-crafting)
Here is some progess [code].LOG 05:56 a.m. 17/05/2014 Created log 05:56 a.m. 17/05/2014 Quests that have been added. -Desert Treasure Bosses -Cook's Assistant -Doric's Quest -Hidden key(Partially started, it's a custom quest) -The restless ghost -Sheep shearer -Rune Mysteries -Imp Catcher 05:56 a.m. 17/05/2014 Misc features -clip -Pickables Added, loading from an external file, that can be edited during server run-time -Objects support, loaded from an external file, that can be edited during server runtime -Consumables support, loaded from an external file, supports potions, food, and can also be edited during server runtime -Created bank At home -Added an interactive basket at home (To take something that is not yours..) -Added cattle for cows and sheep -Added essence mining -Rune Mysteries is now a requirement to enter the essence 06:05 a.m. 17/05/2014 Skills -Clipped firemaking -Fishing (According to my needs, and river troll) -Mining, prospecting -Rune-crafting -Cooking -Smelting 06:07 a.m. 17/05/2014[/code] [img]http://i57.tinypic.com/4ggcbd.png[/img] [img]http://i57.tinypic.com/257kitv.png[/img] [img]http://i58.tinypic.com/10z7d00.png[/img] [img]http://i60.tinypic.com/2d8khao.png[/img] [img]http://i57.tinypic.com/10z8xv6.png[/img] [img]http://i60.tinypic.com/20qlt07.png[/img]
Here is a video of Cattle, gotta fix some animations though. [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SDy7id95OnU&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
There are most likely too much things that im missing, i'll update the thread.

item.title: Evol, the love of money is the root of all evil
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Strucker, post:39, topic:543134”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=662010.msg4446867#msg4446867 date=1409272844]
Continue this, not seeing something different like this a lot.

the material/ghost world is from an RS quest imaright?, I really enjoyed that quest, the idea of the ghost/material world is fun.
[/quote]Well i dont know of that quest i’d appreciate if you could show me it, and well what i did for the astral plane(Ghost world) was to change the height to 4 and transform the player appearance to a ghost npc, and i disabled most of the packets for teleporting and such.[/quote]
They do it in a series. You can later visit the spirit world in specific spots around RuneScape (I’ve personally done all the zones…) and gain some XP in various skills.
You first see it in The Spirit of Summer. Then again in the sequel, Summer’s End.
I don’t think they actually ended the series, so another follow up quest may be on the way…

Read full topic

That is awesome.
[/quote]thanks…

Some updates

[code]09:59 a.m. 30/05/2014
-Added evil chicken 5% chance to fight him when you get back to real world
-Added some herblore(Red berry juice, cadava potion, weapon poison)
-Added Dagger poisoning
-Added Bottle Filling
-Added grinding (Pestle with unicorn horn and blue scale)
-Added music system(Gotta fix an error Client sided)
-Added ratssssssssss
09:47 a.m. 31/05/2014
-Added sounds for attacking with magic, ranged and meele.
-Added sounds for npcs getting hit
01:03 p.m. 31/05/2014
-Added weed planting…(It increases evil)
03:55 p.m. 03/06/2014
Rats tails- Done
Unicorns - Added
UnicornHornDrop - added
Weapon posoining - Done
Limpwurt roots - Added
Limpwurt seeds - Added
Limpwurt root planting - Added.
Add hillgiants - Added
Added mushroom cutting.
-There was an error with picking flax, and mushroms and that stuff,
if you left the area and joined the area again even if it wasnt time for respawning the object it would appear there-fixed
-Hobgoblins added
-Fishing spots added
-Net drop added
-Minor bug patches…
-Placed general store in home.
-Added fillables for herblore and farming

02:29 a.m. 05/06/2014
placed some stores and snitches
Fixed cattle reward.
Handles and heads can now be crafted into axes/pickaxes.
Fixed a bug with smithing.
worked a bit on drops
limpwurt root planting (Farming)
Spinning[/code]
Unfortunately i dont put everything i do on my shitty log.[/quote]
Nice work, can’t wait to see some media of some of this, and I had the hardest time putting everything in my log too.

item.title: Evol, the love of money is the root of all evil
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

@lil I’m aiming for an Alpha in 2 weeks.

UPDATES:
-When you are stealing you can now get caught, but i decided to swap the previous punishments with a great idea i had, since the server is related to religions and such.

When you get caught, the npc that caught you will call an Armadyl Guard, you gotta get away from him in a maximum of 10 seconds, if you don’t, the punishment is for your soul.
Your soul is taken to the fourth/Astral plane (Sky looking) and You have to search for your material body wich is freezed, once you find it you gotta link your body with your soul with an item that you get when you’re sent to the astral plane… Wait what if you don’t get caught?
The Grim Reaper will talk to you congratulating, and your evil power is boosted.

Any comments about this? This part is already done.

Read full topic

item.title: Evol, the love of money is the root of all evil
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

Thanks Artem and Lil Smoker

todays update log.

[code]11:12 a.m. 21/05/2014
-Fillables
11:16 a.m. 21/05/2014
-You can now take items from containers around the world (Just once) (Need to save, because if you logout you can take again)

12:06 p.m. 21/05/2014
-Added more stealable containers
-added map
-Fixed aubury tele
-Added more water sources
12:25 p.m. 21/05/2014
[/code]



Note: Some times your evil power doesn’t increase, but there’s a 33% chance that it will increase.
The other 66% would bring random messages such as:
“The love of money is the root of all evil”
"Those don’t remember are commited to repeat the past"
But it doesn’t increase your evil status.

Read full topic
